name: The Reaper's Harvest
description:
Quick Overview:

Work in progress. End goal is a 2D wave defense style game. Feedback is greatly appreciated.

Story:

It was a day like any other for Death on his farm, until the blood moon rose. Now Death must defend his farm from an onslaught of adversaries, including his own crop.

Controls:
  • WASD: movement
  • Space: Jump
  • Left Click: Slice
  • Right Click: Shoot
  • You can also plug in a controller and use that, you'll figure it out
PS:

Currently settings doesn't do anything and is just place holding
